website_summaries.verdict: All synthetic, unisex spike shoes designed to be lightweight, comfortable, and durable.
pros: Synthetic sole and synthetic mesh upper
Comfortable fit for long training sessions
Full-length EVA midsole, very soft TPU spike plate, and "Sandwich" mesh upper all contribute to this shoe's comfort

customer_reviews.title: Feels so comfortable I forget they are running shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these track shoes to compliment my running shoes. Both are Puma shoes, and both are comfortable. I like the colors on these track shoes, it really looks nicer in person. The shoe run true to size. I highly recommend this sturdy shoes, you can't beat the price either. If they have your size, do yourself a favor and buy a pair.
customer_reviews.author: Mendy

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe, amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I love Puma shoes, and this ones looks really great! For the price it is a great value, looks stylish and comes with the cleats. It is also a comfortable shoe, but would be more comfortable if it wasn't so small. This shoe was a bit too tight, perhaps after wearing it for longer it will stretch a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Elisia Schrauth

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for picking up speed in track. As soon as i got them I got a PR in the 800 and I expect to get a PR in the 1600 and 3200. The grip that the shoe provides is excellent. I will update after my 1600 and 3200. Update: I improved my times in those both races so good shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Great Spikes for the Money
customer_reviews.text: These spikes will get you around the track in a hurry. They do run slightly small as do most Puma shoes. A word of warning- break them in over a few days with some middle distance before you use them in a race/competition. Shoes include spikes and wrench. Build quality is admirable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Keeney

customer_reviews.title: Nice, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Perfect but son never used. Stopped running track soon after starting
customer_reviews.author: mikelmyles

customer_reviews.title: otherwise these things work great as expected
customer_reviews.text: I wouldnt run more that a 1600m , otherwise these things work great as expected. im 6'3" 275lbs , they fit tight but i also wear a size 13-14 , and im sure spikes are supposed to fit very snug.
customer_reviews.author: C.Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: ... 14 year old son through track and they looked great with his track uniform
customer_reviews.text: Got my 14 year old son through track and they looked great with his track uniform! He had no complaints and said he loves the gold/yellow color!
customer_reviews.author: Bright Owl

customer_reviews.title: Seniors on the Run
customer_reviews.text: Look to compete in the Seniors games and I needed this for the Triple Jump and as a backup for my Long Jumps. This is a solid shoe, appears to be well built and it is attractive to wear.
customer_reviews.author: chat Gee

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are REALLY REALLY comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are really comfortable and are still in good condition after a whole year of cross country and will still be good for next season. The only bad thing about these are the plastic spikes in the middle are gone now from running on rocks but still have good traction!! I would recommend these shoes to any cross country runner!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Clark

customer_reviews.title: happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Great value shoe. Can't say anything bad, came as described. A half size larger might be more ideal but overall very happy with the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Puma Complete TFX Distance III Track Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of nike shoes which showed 11.5 so I ordered a 12 just in case and they fitted perfectly, I am very happy with the price, performance of the shoes, delivery etc. this pair of shoes met all my expectations
customer_reviews.author: I_like_shoes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and fits perfect. I bought this for track and it helped improve my speed a lot. Perfect for 400 meter and 800 meter runners.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: They advertised that they ran small so I can't complain. Nice shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Quinstayaway

customer_reviews.title: Light and Fast
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are comfortable, light, and my running time has improved in races. I would recommend these shoes to other runners who seek to improve their running times.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Haran

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes, he wanted them to be a little bigger to be able to use them longer. :)
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L Risinger

customer_reviews.title: Didn't realize they weren't for walking
customer_reviews.text: They are cool. But they are also cleats. Smooth surfaces leads to sliding. But I slide on just fine. lol
customer_reviews.author: Omelio T Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Same as above
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were said to be orange/black but where more a mustered colour which wasn't quite the colour that was hoped for but still very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: WendyHollis

customer_reviews.title: Excelent track shoes for mid distance (training and races 800
customer_reviews.text: Excelent track shoes for mid distance (training and races 800, 1500 mts). As usual I needed to buy them 1/2 size larger than running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio

product_meta.title: PUMA Complete TFX Distance 3-U
product_meta.description:
The PUMA Complete TFX Distance 3 is built for high school distance runners searching for a sock-like fit in a lightweight durable package to make long training sessions more comfortable. Offering a full length EVA midsole together with a very soft TPU spike plate and Sandwich mesh upper makes this spike the most comfortable in Puma's range.

PUMA is the global athletic brand that successfully fuses influences from sport, lifestyle and fashion. PUMA's unique industry perspective delivers the unexpected in sport-lifestyle footwear, apparel and accessories, through technical innovation and revolutionary design.
feature_bullets: Built for high school distance runners who are searching for a sock like fit in a lightweight and durable pakage
